title:
Constant-time $\psi$ queries in $O \left( r \log \frac{n}{r} + r \log
  \sigma \right)$ bits
authors:
Travis Gagie, Giovanni Manzini, Gonzalo Navarro and Marinella
  Sciortino
abstract:
Given a text $T [1..n]$ over an alphabet of size $\sigma$ whose BWT has $r$
runs, we can store $T$ in $O \left( r \log \frac{n}{r} + r \log \sigma \right)$
bits such that we can answer $\psi$ queries in constant time.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Data Structures and Algorithms
